title: Why do I love John Lennon so much? - Quora

response.answer_text: Love a pile of earth…or is he ashes? Because you are irrational. Same if you think his fame came from from his murder. But maybe you remember him from what he DID while alive: Song writing, interracial relationship, peace-striving, Beatles good and bad things, charity. You tell us... Not that we care much…
